meta.title: Abhijith Shenoy H — Terminal Résumé
meta.description: Senior Site Reliability Engineer & Cloud Specialist with 6.5+ years of experience

about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a Senior Site Reliability Engineer with 6.5+ years of experience specializing in cloud infrastructure, automation, and reliability engineering. Currently pursuing my Master's in Network Engineering at Southern Methodist University, I have a proven track record of optimizing systems, reducing debugging time from 24 hours to under a minute, and saving $1M in monthly revenue through ElastiCache optimizations. I'm passionate about building robust, scalable systems and mentoring teams in cloud-native technologies.

projects.name: Log Parser for Bug Detection
projects.tagline: Built multithreaded pattern matching algorithms in Python

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline with Jenkins & Argo CD
projects.tagline: Deployed Flask app on Kubernetes with load balancer

projects.name: Custom CloudWatch Dashboard
projects.tagline: Tracked EBS IOPS/throughput spikes with auto-triggered alarms

experience.description: Reported to Director, focused on automation. Built a log parser for bug detection in large logs using multithreaded pattern matching algorithms in Python, reducing debugging time from 24 hours to under a minute.

Handled E2M escalations and high-impact issues. Led on-prem to AWS migrations (App Migration Service, CloudEndure). Migrated Redis workloads to Amazon ElastiCache. Automated patch management with Systems Manager and built Ops dashboards. Optimized ElastiCache clusters, saving $1M in monthly revenue. Published internal and external knowledge base articles.
Escalation support for EC2, ElastiCache, EBS, CloudEndure, and Systems Manager. Led multiple customer profile roles and internal campaigns.

education.degree: Master of Science in Network Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science
